location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, Currently at Shiraz, to Lord Moira, President and Governor General in Council, Fort William

mods.abstract: Letter informs Lord Moira [Francis Rawdon-Hastings] that Lieutenant Robert Taylor proceeds to India with a dispatch from the British Ambassador to the Court of Persia [Sir Gore Ouseley] for Lord Moira. Bruce also states that Taylor is accompanied by a Persian officer, who bears a letter from the King of Persia [Fat'h Ali Shah Qajar] to Lord Moira.
